house_listing.house_description: Beautiful townhome directly on golf course. Trees and deck make it a lovely & private setting. Storage shed. Formal front room could be dining or living rm. Fam rm has brick fireplace & mantle. Eating area overlooks backyd. 2 large bedrooms each w/ bath & walk in closets.
house_listing.firm_name: RE/MAX Central Realty RE/MAX Central Realty
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Foyer, Pantry,Storage Space, Walk-In Closet(s)
